hero.subtitle: The next-generation Prop Trading platform powered by AI and real-time data.

features.title_ai: Don't Trade Alone. AI is Your Co-pilot.
features.desc_ai: Our algorithms analyze millions of data points per second: news sentiment, inter-market correlations, and volume anomalies. Receive institutional insights directly on your dashboard.
features.desc_data: Access raw data feeds from Polygon.io and Databento, plus exclusive scrapers. No delays, no artificial slippage. Just the market truth, instantly.

how_it_works.subtitle: Our process is simple, transparent and designed to identify real talent.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Select the account size that matches your ambition and configure your trading preferences.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Trade in our professional simulated environment respects rigorous risk management objectives.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Once the target is reached, receive a live account funded by TradeSense and keep up to 90% of your profits.

pricing.subtitle: Select the account size that fits your strategy. No recurring fees.

founder.bio: "Passionate about the fusion of market finance and cutting-edge technologies. I designed TradeSense AI to democratize access to institutional trading tools and offer a fair chance to global talent."

footer.brand_desc: The first AI-powered Prop Trading platform in Morocco.

simulator.title: AI Strategy Simulator
simulator.subtitle: Adjust market parameters to see TradeSense's real-time calculations.
simulator.verdict_high: ✅ STRATEGY: AGGRESSIVE BUY. Markets are aligned. Consider increasing position size.
simulator.verdict_med: ⚠️ STRATEGY: WAIT. High uncertainty. Scalping only recommended.
simulator.verdict_low: ⛔ STRATEGY: DO NOT TRADE. High liquidation risk. Sit on hands.
simulator.tooltip_trend: The AI analyzes 50+ technical indicators to identify the prevailing trend.
simulator.tooltip_sentiment: Real-time NLP analysis of global news feeds and social sentiment.
simulator.tooltip_volatility: Measures the intensity of price movements and potential slippage.
